pr_title: CLDR-13771 ansible: fix proxy so users don't all appear as 127.0.0.1

timeline.message: CLDR-13771 ansible: fix proxy so users don't all appear as 127.0.0.1

timeline.bodyText: FYI, just before this, before "allow_all", we're going to need rewrite ^/(.+)\._[\da-f]+_\.(js|css)$ /$1.$2 break; for https://unicode-org.atlassian.net/browse/CLDR-13582
timeline.author: btangmu
